verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will seek You, Lord, while I am in my youth.
I will trust You, Lord, and I'll proclaim Your truth,
For You searched and found me while I was far away
And in my troubled times, you always keep me safe.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
The Lord is my light and my salvation.
Whom shall I fear; whom shall I fear?
The Lord is the stronghold of my life.
Whom shall I fear; whom shall I fear?
